extendedInfo.description: Now your Android phone can remind you of all your vehicle maintenance. With the Mr. Tire Mobile App you can:â¢	Track your vehicle maintenance schedules.â¢	Search and record your repair history.â¢	Receive notifications of when services are due. â¢	Located your closest or favorite Mr. Tire store. â¢	Make appointments quick and easy. â¢	Search for tires.â¢	View and use promotional coupons.Mr. Tire Autotire Tread Quarters Treadquarters Auto Repair Auto Maintenance Vehicle Repair Oil Change Tire Search Tire Sale Brake inspection state fuel belt timing manufacturer muffler ignition

reviews.title: Not very effective
reviews.comment: I coordinated appointment with this app and was offered a 50% discount on an oil change for using the app. It seemed to run smoothly at first and also received confirmation email and a phone call. However, when at the actual appt., the tires were over $150 more than what I ordered through the app. And the staff complained and couldn\'t find \"that crazy app paperwork\". Doing it through this app was more troublesome than physically walking in. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Jim James

reviews.title: Service
reviews.comment: I know I might seem bias because my brother works for Mr. Tire, but I have received wonderful service not only at his location but also in locations all over town. Thank you Mr. Tire you have trained wonderful employees.
reviews.author: Sheri Yvette Base White

reviews.title: Nice app but has problem
reviews.comment: I was adding in my vehicle history and then my vehicle disappears. So I go to re-add it and it says it exists already. Not sure what\'s up with this, maybe some caching problem.    UPDATE: Now it says I have the same vehicle but three times over. All identical. No way to delete the vehicles so contacted the developer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: These are \"Promotions\"
reviews.comment: Why are the \"Promotions\" in this app more expensive than the coupons on their web site?  Also, why does the app need permission to start on boot?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Now i can tell people prices without being at the store!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice app to track My repertoire
reviews.comment: I love the app.  it was working until i tried to add more services.  Now i cannot see any of my Vehicles.  If i tried to app, the app said vehiclexist
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: NeverSmile. Trying it so only 2 stars. SGS2 Topeka ks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Helpful app to keep tabs on my vehicle maintenance.
reviews.comment: I got new tires and brakes on my Jeep wrangler.  I put extra big tires on and the shop didn\'t understand about tire spacers or stronger brakes for the big tires. They are great for oem parts but careful you know what you want for after market items.  They took longer than they said for installation,  but the manager had great customer service so I couldn\'t stay mad.
reviews.author: Etan Anthony

reviews.title: Such a useless app
reviews.comment: This app stinks! It works fine, but it\'s worthless.  They email I received from them says I will get 50% off an oil change just for getting the app. I don\'t see that anywhere when I get the app.The price in the app is $21.99 for an oil change, but the coupons they send me through email are for $19.99. So, why would I want to pay $2 more?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Requires too much info
reviews.comment: Won\'t let you do anything until you set up an account first. Must I really go through all that just to check tire prices or store locations?  Uninstalled.
reviews.author: Robert Kramer

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Great app. Haven\'t seen a better offer yet!
reviews.author: A Google User
